none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 28, 2022 Description from Terminal Escape:
 I'll never know how this monster slipped through the cracks, but OPTION's sole release from 2018 demands to be pulled back to the surface and devoured. Disjointed punk with choppy UK rhythms and a fiery buzzsaw guitar that sounds like it may break even before Dan's barks. The Dan I reference is the chap from NO SIR I WON'T and SURRENDER (and others), and OPTION follow a similar path - a path that brings them even closer to an ultimate destination. The Hour Of Action feels realized; no hesitation whatsoever from a band who are seizing their influences and taking flight...and only left us with six songs. THE HOUR OF ACTION
https://anotheroption.bandcamp.com/releases

seo.title: Option - The Hour Of Action - Terminal Escape
